name: Tenril
description:
The game is currently a very early prototype, if you have any skills with Unity, 3D modeling, animating or rigging or another skill you feel would be helpful to us, you can contact me if interested in joining the team. We are all working for free as this is a passion project. If this project receives any donations, it will be split among all members that have actively contributed.

Any Feedback is greatly appreciated!
